long_description: When you're really working up a sweat in your yoga class, you'll appreciate having the Jade Microfiber yoga towel under you to absorb moisture and provide great grip. Lay the soft polyester microfiber towel on top of your yoga mat to limit slipping during sweaty workouts; material absorbs sweat and dries quickly. Jade Microfiber yoga towel is great for hot yoga or any exercise where you sweat a lot, such as Pilates. Through its partnership with thewaterproject.org, Jade will provide 1 month's worth of clean drinking water for 1 person in the developing world for every towel sold.
short_description: When you're really working up a sweat in your yoga class, you'll appreciate having the Jade Microfiber yoga towel under you to absorb moisture and provide great grip.
